DataElement.preferredName: Mutant Allele Burden Laboratory Test Result Receive Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An altered form of an individual, organism, population, or genetic character that differs from the corresponding wild type due to one or more alterations (mutations)._Mutually exclusive alternative forms of the same gene occupying the same locus on homologous chromosomes, differing in nucleotide sequence and governing the same biochemical and developmental process._The quantity of something that is borne or carried by an individual or population._The outcome of a laboratory test._To take, accept, or get something offered._The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

Concepts.definition: An altered form of an individual, organism, population, or genetic character that differs from the corresponding wild type due to one or more alterations (mutations).

Mutually exclusive alternative forms of the same gene occupying the same locus on homologous chromosomes, differing in nucleotide sequence and governing the same biochemical and developmental process.
The quantity of something that is borne or carried by an individual or population.
The outcome of a laboratory test.
To take, accept, or get something offered.
